title: Typographic Communications Today.pdf
description:
Typographic Communications Today
by Edward M Gotschall

First edition, second printing. Studies the expansion of the field of typography with the introduction of the computer. Chapters include "American Design Pioneers," "The Influence of the Private Press," "Typeface milestones," "Bits, Bytes and Typographic Design," and "The Many Faces of Typography Today." Contains over 900 illustrations, more than 500 of which are in color. A fascinating study.

Scanned version

Enjoy!
